title: Katie Hopkins made laughing stock as she tries to insult Meghan Markle's glow

Outspoken Katie Hopkins' latest criticism of Meghan Markle, the Duchess of Sussex, has been met with bewilderment by Twitter users.

The former Apprentice contestant, 44, decided to go after Meghan, the wife of Prince Harry, for her dress sense and radiant complexion - which left social media users baffled that the reality TV star felt this was a flaw.

Katie's words came during her appearance of a new Channel 9 documentary 60 Minutes, which according to the description focuses on 'where it all went wrong for Meghan'.

The Celebrity Big Brother star says of the former Suits actress: "There she is in her one shoulder dress, being glowing. Because all she does is glow.

"Abdicate. Off you go.

"She wears bad clothes, when did we ask for that?"

(Image: Channel 9/PA)

Finding Katie's comments confusing - as many would not deem them insulting - Twitter users defended Meghan on the micro-blogging website.

"Imagine being Katie Hopkins and having the audacity to call out Meghan Markle for 'wearing bad clothes,'" wrote a perplexed Twitter user.

Another puzzled person added: "What is she really...she's a no one, she's a divorcee, she wears bad clothes!

(Image: Channel 9/PA)

"All this from a divorcee, who sh**s married men in fields, looks like she got dressed in the dark, is on the brink of bankruptcy and a nasty b***h on Twitter to boot #MeghanMarkle #KatieHopkins."

One shared: "She wears bad clothes says b***y katie hopskins, who dresses like a housewife who buys bad cheap second hand clothes from a charity clothes shop. Meghan Markle dresses beautifully, stylish."

"Meghan markle is minding her own business still glowing unlike Katie Hopkins who is a hating ass WRINKLY B***H."

"I truly believe Australia’s pitiful Katie Hopkins has an inferiority complex and feels extremely threatened by the beautiful , talented , sparkling, charismatic and absolutely glowing Meghan Markle. What else would yu expect from a jealous audience," mused another.

Another defended Meghan, by writing: "Katie hopkins out here looking like a burnt chicken and being mad for the 172838th time over the fact meghan markle is glowing like the princess she is."

(Image: Channel 9/PA)

The Australian programme references criticism Prince Harry and Meghan received last month for taking four private planes in just 11 days as they travelled to Ibiza and Nice for luxury holidays with son Archie.

Hopkins adds in the clip: "Meghan Markle is the biggest hypocrite there is."

During the show, the rent-a-gob goes to Buckingham Palace to speak to well-wishers and fans outside.

When a tourist tells her "there's nothing wrong with Meghan", she puts her hands on her hips and replies: "But then there's nothing right with her either."

(Image: AFP via Getty Images)

It comes after fans the official Royal Family Twitter account liked a tweet calling out the Duchess of Sussex’s critics.

The Tweet, which was liked by the account, read: "“These anti-Meghan Markle trolls are all the same: they pine for ‘the good old days.’

“She was genius to title her Vogue issue ‘Forces for Change.’

“We are witnessing a seismic shift in power and culture, and her haters are furious and terrified. Oh well. Get used to it.”

The pro-Meghan post was liked by the official royal family account, which can be seen on its Twitter page.
description: Katie Hopkins has been widely mocked for hitting out at the Duchess of Sussex after that emotional ITV documentary
